Enjoy movies and all your media on your PC, notebook, Smartphone, tablet and TV. A true universal player, PowerDVD makes it simple to play all your movies, videos, photos & music at their best.
PowerDVD 14 packs more than 60 new and enhanced features, from new file playback feature in Cinema mode to CyberLink TrueTheaterÃ‚Â® enhancement that lets you play Blu-ray and HD videos at quality beyond HD. Delivering intuitive design and forward-facing technologies, PowerDVD 14 is our strongest release yet.
